education.title: ELECTRICAL TECHNICIAN
education.description: During my high school period at 'Instituto Mariano Fragueiro', I acquired solid skills in the design, installation, and maintenance of electrical systems. I actively participated in practical projects, gaining a practical understanding of the theoretical concepts learned in the classroom.

education.title: BACHELOR'S DEGREE IN COMPUTER SCIENCE
education.description: I am currently in my third year of the program at 'Universidad Siglo 21'.

workExperience.title: Internship in Instrumentation and Control at Embalse Nuclear Power Plant
workExperience.description: This experience provided me with valuable practical insight into industrial processes and the application of advanced technologies in a critical environment.

workExperience.title: Instrumentation Technician during the Shutdown at Embalse Nuclear Power Plant
workExperience.description: Skilled Instrumentation and Control Officer during the shutdown of Embalse Nuclear Power Plant.

workExperience.title: Customer Service
workExperience.description: Family business venture with over 2 years of experience in customer service, acquiring communication, teamwork, and leadership skills.

professionalCourses.title: Oracle Next Education F2 T5 Back-end Program
professionalCourses.description: A course focused on Backend with an intensive learning experience that covered over 330 hours of specialized content. During this course, I consolidated my knowledge in key back-end development technologies, including Java, SQL 'MySQL', Spring, and Oracle Cloud, along with agile methodologies and programming best practices.

professionalCourses.title: Python, Data Science in OCI, and Oracle Analytics
professionalCourses.description: A course covering the use of Python along with pandas, numpy, matplotlib, seaborn, scikit-learn, Oracle Accelerated Data Science Library (ADSL), and Oracle Analytics Cloud (OAC).
